Class JsonServiceUtility

  • java.lang.Object

      • deserialize

        public <T> T deserialize(java.lang.String jsonStr,
                java.lang.Class<T> objType)
        Convert Json String to java class
        Type Parameters:
        T - generic type associated with the class
        Parameters:
        jsonStr - Json string to be converted to java class
        objType - type associated with class - this parameter can be returned by calling someObject.class to get the class type of someObject
        Returns:
        the object class that is deserialize into

                            java.lang.String action,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> messageList)
        Check whether the json input is valid
        Parameters:
        incomingRequest - the Json string request
        action - the web service action eg. dumptable, update bid
        messageList - list of error messages
        Returns:
        validity status

        Check whether there is any missing or blank element
        Parameters:
        element - incoming Json string converted into Json element
